org.gservlet

Class FileWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gservlet.FileWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileWatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The FileWatcher class checks a folder for file changes and notifies the listeners accordingly.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.io.File folder
      The folder to be watched

      The list of listeners
